FineZubanCigar.name: Fine Zuban Cigar
FineZubanCigar.description: A rolled Tobacco Cigar from Planet Zuban 5, It smells like fresh Zuban tobacco.

CigarRollie.name: Rolled Cigar
CigarRollie.description: A hand rolled Tobacco Cigar, It smells like fresh Europan tobacco.

WeedCigarRollie.name: Rolled Blunt
WeedCigarRollie.description: A hand rolled Blunt, It smells like fresh Europan cannabis.

SpiceCigarRollie.name: Rolled Ballast Spice Blunt
SpiceCigarRollie.description: A hand rolled Blunt, It smells like the inside of a clown's... nevermind.

LeGrandCigar.name: Le Grand Cigar
LeGrandCigar.description: Hand rolled by Queen Elizabeth II, with the original copy of the United States Constitution, stolen by Space Mushrooms.

CupaCoffee.name: Cup of Coffee
CupaCoffee.description: A cup of coffee, Europa Mermaid brand, It smells fresh.

CupaTea.name: Cup of Tea
CupaTea.description: A cup of Tea, Europa Grey brand, It smells fresh.

ShroomBottle.name: Prescribed Magic Mushrooms
ShroomBottle.description: A pill bottle containing 3 doses of Psilocybin Mushrooms, It smells like fungus.

WeedRollie.name: Weed Joint
WeedRollie.description: Loose Europan cannabis from questionable sources, rolled into a thin polycarbonate film for smoking.

SpiceRollie.name: Ballast Spice Joint
SpiceRollie.description: Some stuff just doesn't want to be smoked, the wiggling tentacles are a dead giveaway.

TobaccoRollie.name: Tobacco Joint
TobaccoRollie.description: Loose Europan tobacco from questionable sources, rolled into a thin polycarbonate film for smoking.

WeedCigarette.name: Weed Cigarette
WeedCigarette.description: Quality weed in a thin polycarbonate film, ready for smoking.

Cigarette.name: Cigarette
Cigarette.description: Quality tobacco in a thin polycarbonate film, ready for smoking.

hundredsCigarette.name: Cigarette 100s
hundredsCigarette.description: A Loose Benges and Headsons 100mm Cigarette, It smells like fresh Europan tobacco

bnhcigpack.name: Benges and Headsons 100s Cigarette Pack
bnhcigpack.description: A polycarbonate container designed with a flavor-protective foil, and sealed through a transparent airtight plastic film. This one is of a particularly expensive brand.

oldcigpack.name: Old Cigarette Pack
oldcigpack.description: A polycarbonate container designed with a flavor-protective foil, and sealed through a transparent airtight plastic film. This one has begun to rot away.

newcigpack.name: New Cigarette Pack
newcigpack.description: A polycarbonate container designed with a flavor-protective foil, and sealed through a transparent airtight plastic film. This one is relatively well preserved.
